FuncDef:
The trust upstream priority command enables BA classification for PPP packets.
The undo trust upstream priority command disables BA classification of PPP packets.
By default, BA classification of PPP packets is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In L2TP scenarios, an LAC processes PPP packets sent from an LNS with high priority. However, downstream switches cannot process high-priority packets. To enable BA classification for PPP packets so that the packet priorities can be adjusted, run the trust upstream priority command.
Precautions
This command takes effect only on the LAC.
